content: **from the website ** these fit a child 4 - 8 years old for the larger size use 2 strands of yarn i made this one with one strand of yarn and it fits a 5 - 6 year old fine for a longer foot just add more row where originally it says 3 - 10 maybe do 3 - 14 instead the cuff can be made longer too if you like these work up fast and are easy to make formerly available on geocities october 1 2011 website registration expired still available at this archived link 1 1 http //web archive org/web/20100628174521/http //www lindaslists net/childsock htm
